references: Amending: Ordinance No. 110669 and Clerk File No. 296400
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 12W, Page 55 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property located at 6416 - 15th Avenue N.W. from Lowrise 3 (L-3) zone to Neighborhood Commercial 3 with a 40 foot height limitation (NC3-40') zone, and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of John C. Pattok, C.F. 296400.)
